info.name: Geological Sample Management API
info.description: Postman collection for the Geological Sample Management REST API. This collection includes all CRUD operations for managing geological samples.

request.description: Check if the API is running and responsive.

request.description: Create a new geological sample. Returns 201 Created with the created sample.
Get all geological samples with pagination support. Returns a paginated response.
Get a specific geological sample by its ID. Returns 200 OK with the sample, or 404 Not Found if the sample doesn't exist.

request.description: Update an existing geological sample. Returns 200 OK with the updated sample, or 404 Not Found if the sample doesn't exist.
Delete a geological sample by its ID. Returns 204 No Content on success, or 404 Not Found if the sample doesn't exist.
